recipes.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.description: A creamy Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, and pancetta.
instructions: Boil the pasta in salted water.
Combine pasta, pancetta, and egg mixture.

recipes.title: Vegetable Stir Fry
recipes.description: A quick and colorful vegetable stir fry with soy sauce and sesame oil.
instructions: Stir-fry in hot pan with sesame oil.
Add soy sauce and cook for 3 minutes.
